alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:48PM MST until January 06 at 10:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO 3 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM Friday to 3 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
